formatted_address: 2, Jalan Medini Utara 4, GLENEAGLES JOHOR BARU, 79250 Johor Bahru, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Dato Dr. David Cheah Plastic Surgery

reviews.text:
I recently underwent eyelid surgery with Dr Cheah and I couldn’t be happier with the results! Initially, I was concerned about dark shadows under my eyes and eyebags due to aging. After extensive research, I opted for lower eyelid surgery
Dr  meticulously talked me through every step of the procedure—without pressuring me into other services.
3 months post now, my face looks rejuvenated and natural. A big thank you to Dr for your excellent work and his excellent team for their outstanding care and service. I highly recommend his clinic.

“Dato Dr Prof David Cheah Sin Hing exemplifies excellence in plastic surgery. With unmatched expertise and a compassionate approach, he delivers natural, beautiful results while prioritizing patient care and safety at the highest standand.Truly the best !!!

vicinity: 2, Jalan Medini Utara 4, GLENEAGLES JOHOR BARU, Johor Bahru
